author: deluckybrick
title: OMG another roadplate review!
review:
Yes, I am reviewing roadplates.
I got this set from Legoland because I wanted a little variety in my town, and I have not been disappointed with these.  The sides provide ample room for the beginnings of buildings, and the middles make good flower/tree beds.  I also really like the crosswalks on here.  My only complaint is that Lego changed the size of the bikelanes on the sides.  Altogether, 9/10.
